item.name: Dr. Bessel van der Kolk
item.description: This researcher has written and done research on trauma, with his most well known book, "The Body Keeps the Score".

item.name: Dr. Lenore Terr
item.description: This researcher focuses largely on childhood trauma.

item.name: Dr. Julian Ford
item.description: This researcher focuses heavily on assessment and treatment of trauma disorders, and has participated in research alongside Dr. Bessel van der Kolk and Dr. Joseph Spinazzola.

item.name: Dr. Joseph Spinazzola
item.description: This researcher focuses on treatment and the research on traumatic stress.

item.name: complextrauma.org
item.description: This resource gives general information about complex trauma, of which developmental trauma has some overlap.
